newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT-AFLAC 1997 EPS estimate cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-AFLAC 1997 EPS estimate cut.

text.p: -- EVEREN Securities Inc said Monday it reduced its estimate for AFLAC Inc's 1997 earnings to $2.60 a share from $2.72.
-- cited a rise in the firm's yen/dollar exchange rate assumptions to 118 yen per dollar from 112.
-- EVEREN said it also reduced it six-month price target on AFLAC to $42 a share from $44, and cut its 18-month target to $46 from $48.
-- "These changes are based on the appreciation of the dollar and our revised EPS estimates," EVEREN said in a statement.
-- ALFAC, an insurance group, was off 1/4 at 42-1/8.
